alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:01PM CDT until May 18 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MARSHALL...SOUTH CENTRAL MADISON AND SOUTHEASTERN MORGAN COUNTIES... At 301 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Morgan City, or 7 miles north of Arab, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southern Huntsville, Redstone Arsenal, Owens Cross Roads, Morgan City, Union Grove, Eddy, Laceys Spring, Ryan Crossroads and Whitesburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
